text: I would say that the Russia conspiracy theory is dead, but we are stuck with the consequences: a new Cold War, decreased tolerance of dissent, censorship on social media, and the Democratic Party remains in denial as to why they lost to a candidate as terrible as Trump. #p2
author: RonChusid

text: If Trump is reelected, the number one reason will be the Russiagate conspiracy theorists, who helped distract from Trump's actual crimes with fabricated claims--claims which originated with Hillary Clinton's attempt to blame others for her inability to beat Trump. #P2  #topprog
author: RonChusid

text: Just a reminder, as I pulled up the link for another discussion, Pete Guttigeig is not as progressive as he first appeared. He opposed both clemency for Chelsea Manning and opposed Snowden's release of the NSA surveillance information. #p2 #p21 #topprog
author: RonChusid

text: While there has been some overprescribing of opiods we don't need politicians with no medical training making regulations for all patients. Some do need more than one week's worth after surgical procedures.
author: RonChusid

text: Except he created many of those scars. #p2 #p21 #topprog

text: Yes, but can't ignore his idiotic opposition to Snowden and Manning.

text: We need a new left/right anti-war coalition to fight the Blob. #p2 #p21 #topprog

text: Chelsea Clinton is a terrible, horrible, no good person--undoubtedly a result of being raised by a pair of psychopathic parents. She was totally wrong in her criticism of Ilhan Omar. However she is not the cause of the New Zealand shootings. #p2  #topprog

text:
Pelosi lies:

"When they say Medicare for All, people have to understand this: Medicare for All is not as good a benefit as the Affordable Care Act."  #P2 #p21 #topprog

text: Actually Democrats (along with Republicans) do support murdering babies, but it happens in drone attacks and other acts of war, not abortions.  #p2 #p21 #topprog

text: The Medicare for All Bill is a winner  #p2 #p21 #topprog

text: If you really care about beating Trump in 2020, keep in mind the fact that nobody is as unelectable as a centrist Democrat. #p2 #p21 #topprog

text: People who say they will not vote for Bernie because he is an old white male should be called out for this ageism, racism, and sexism.  #p2 #p21 #topprog
